analysis.summary: The missing field 'address' requires collection of a physical or mailing address, likely for shipping, billing, or contact purposes in a form or data collection workflow.
insights: Field type is 'address' based on explicit field name and address_collection context
Standard address components needed: street address, city, state/province, postal code, country
May require both billing and shipping address variants depending on use case
Should support international address formats beyond US/domestic addresses
recommendations: Implement as multi-field address component with street line 1, optional street line 2, city, state/province, postal/zip code, and country fields
Add client-side validation for required fields (typically street, city, state, postal code)
Use autocomplete/address lookup API for better UX and data accuracy
Consider separate billing/shipping address toggle if e-commerce context
Apply regex validation for postal codes based on selected country
Mark as high priority if blocking transaction or fulfillment processes
